distinct

order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into FUN_MAC (MACADDR, COMP_ID, DEPT_ID, COMP_NO, DEPT_NO, PCNAME, FLAG, ROAM, ROAM_USER, [OWNER], PCDISKNO, ROUTEMAC, REGTIME, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, ORGANIZATION_ID) values (#{macaddr,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{compNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{roam,jdbcType=BIT}, #{roamUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcdiskno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routemac,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{regtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update FUN_MAC
MACADDR = #{record.macaddr,jdbcType=CHAR},
COMP_ID = #{record.compId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEPT_ID = #{record.deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COMP_NO = #{record.compNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update FUN_MAC set MACADDR = #{record.macaddr,jdbcType=CHAR}, COMP_ID = #{record.compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEPT_ID = #{record.deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMP_NO = #{record.compNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_NO = #{record.deptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PCNAME = #{record.pcname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{record.flag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ROAM = #{record.roam,jdbcType=BIT}, ROAM_USER = #{record.roamUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, [OWNER] = #{record.owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PCDISKNO = #{record.pcdiskno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROUTEMAC = #{record.routemac,jdbcType=CHAR}, REGTIME = #{record.regtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{record.lastLoginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGANIZATION_ID = #{record.organizationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update FUN_MAC
COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COMP_NO = #{compNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT_NO = #{deptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PCNAME = #{pcname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ROAM = #{roam,jdbcType=BIT},
ROAM_USER = #{roamUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
[OWNER] = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PCDISKNO = #{pcdiskno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROUTEMAC = #{routemac,jdbcType=CHAR},
REGTIME = #{regtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where MACADDR = #{macaddr,jdbcType=CHAR}

update FUN_MAC set COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMP_NO = #{compNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_NO = #{deptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PCNAME = #{pcname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ROAM = #{roam,jdbcType=BIT}, ROAM_USER = #{roamUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, [OWNER] = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PCDISKNO = #{pcdiskno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROUTEMAC = #{routemac,jdbcType=CHAR}, REGTIME = #{regtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where MACADDR = #{macaddr,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select FUN_MAC.MACADDR, FUN_COMP.COMP_CNAME, FUN_COMP.COMP_NO, FUN_DEPTS.DEPT_CNAME, FUN_DEPTS.DEPT_NO from FUN_MAC left join FUN_COMP on FUN_MAC.COMP_ID=FUN_COMP.COMP_ID left join FUN_DEPTS on FUN_MAC.COMP_ID=FUN_DEPTS.COMP_ID and FUN_MAC.DEPT_ID = FUN_DEPTS.DEPT_ID where FUN_MAC.MACADDR =#{macAddr}
mapper.update: update FUN_MAC set ROAM = 0, ROAM_USER = null where COMP_ID = #{compId}

update FUN_MAC
OWNER = #{param.owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG = #{param.loginType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where MACADDR = #{param.macaddr,jdbcType=CHAR}
